name: AstroWubs
description:
My submission for the "ScoreSpace Jam #12 🕹️"

The theme was "COMBINING", so I combined a space shooter with a rhythm game!

Controls: Z-X-N-M to shoot at the aliens when they are inside the crosshair.

CREDITS:
- ship sprite: OpenGameArt CC0 licese
- everything else (including music) was made by myself

Made in abuot 5 hours.
